DataElement.preferredName: Post Transplant Viral Infection Post Last Patient Visit Occurrence Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no indicator for whether the participant experience a post-transplant viral infection since their last study visit.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Post Transplant Viral Infection Post Last Patient Visit Occurrence
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Used with organs, tissues, or cells for transplantation from one site to another within the same subject, or from one subject to another of the same species or different species._Any disease caused by a virus._Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order._Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining._A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional._An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Used with organs, tissues, or cells for transplantation from one site to another within the same subject, or from one subject to another of the same species or different species.:Any disease caused by a virus.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Used with organs, tissues, or cells for transplantation from one site to another within the same subject, or from one subject to another of the same species or different species.
Any disease caused by a virus.

Property.preferredDefinition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.:Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.:A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.:An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

Concepts.definition: Happening at a time subsequent to a reference time; later in time or order.
Coming after all others in time or space or degree or being the only one remaining.
A visit by a patient or study participant to a medical professional.
An instance of something happening, such as an event or incident.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
